heroData.heading: Transform your business with expert Power Platform consulting
heroData.subtitle: We are the experts, so you don't have to be!
heroData.description: Big companies offer oversimplified "low-code" solutions for small to medium-sized businesses. You and I know it's not that straightforward. Creating reliable, actionable dashboards, apps, and automated processes requires expertise, even with "low-code" tools.

banner.headline: "Remember when someone claimed the dog ate their homework?"
banner.content: Running a business faces similar hurdles. Sure, it's not calculus anymore but it's tedious for you all the same. That's where we come in ‚Äì to tackle those challenges when the dog eats your best intentions.

problem.heading: Just to avoid doing it?
paragraphs: Running a business comes with its fair share of roadblocks. It may not be calculus, but it sure feels just as draining sometimes. That's where we step in ‚Äî handling the chaos when life gets in the way.
That's where we come in ‚Äì to tackle those challenges when the dog eats your best intentions.

We specialize in solving problems by streamlining operations, automating workflows, and providing data-driven insights. We ensure seamless integration with your existing systems, maximizing efficiency and productivity.

services.headerLabel: How can I help your business?
services.headerDescription: From data engineering to AI automation, we provide end-to-end solutions that transform how your business operates and makes decisions.

services.title: Data Engineering & Integration
services.tagline: Unify your data, unlock your business intelligence.
services.description: We build strong data foundations that connect cloud, on-premise, and application data into a single, reliable source of truth.

benefits.text: End data silos with seamless system integration
Achieve faster reporting through automated data pipelines
Gain data quality, consistency, and governance across platforms

services.title: Business Intelligence & Analytics
services.description: We transform raw data into visual stories that empower smarter decisions through dashboards, KPI monitoring, and automated insights.

benefits.text: See business performance in real time
Turn complex analytics into clear, actionable insights

services.title: Application Development & Automation
services.description: We design low-code apps and workflow automations that replace manual tasks with intuitive digital experiences ‚Äî all built for scalability.

benefits.text: Reduce manual effort and process bottlenecks
Deliver internal tools and portals in days, not months
Integrate data and workflows seamlessly across systems

services.title: AI Agents & Intelligent Automation
services.description: We deploy custom AI agents that learn from your data, automate decisions, and assist teams through natural conversation.

benefits.text: Build virtual assistants for analytics, CRM, and operations
Automate reporting, forecasting, and customer interactions
Create personalized business copilots powered by your data

services.title: Cloud Migration & Modernization
services.tagline: Move with confidence. Scale without limits.
services.description: We help organizations migrate, optimize, and modernize their infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and Oracle Cloud.

benefits.text: Migrate legacy systems with minimal downtime
Modernize data architecture for scalability and speed
Adopt a multi-cloud strategy for flexibility and resilience

showcaseData.headerDescription: We deliver actionable insights through beautiful, functional dashboards and automated workflows that drive results.

whyChooseData.heading: Why Choose Rex Eight IT?
whyChooseData.description: We're not a faceless corporation. We're a dedicated team that understands your unique challenges and brings both technical expertise and personalized service to every engagement.

features.title: Veteran & Woman Owned
features.description: Discipline, integrity, and diverse perspectives in every project

features.title: Microsoft Certified
features.description: Advanced certifications in Power Platform and Azure services

features.title: Rapid Delivery
features.description: Solutions in days, not months, with our low-code expertise

features.title: True Partnership
features.description: Direct access to our expert team who understand your business

cta.heading: Ready to Transform Your Data Into Action?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help you unlock the full potential of your business data with Microsoft Power Platform solutions. Schedule a free consultation today.
